nodes.text: Battle of the unidentified desert planet

A battle was fought during the Clone Wars on an desert planet. The Galactic Republic fought the Confederacy of Independent Systems there in 19 BBY. During the battle, a Twi'lek Jedi led a clone trooper charge but was killed by an explosion. CT-5539 picked up her body and rallied Red and Blue Teams against B2 super battle droids and droidekas. Later CT-5539 was aboard a Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry with a Zabrak General. CT-5539 was hit by a laser bolt and fell from the transport. He survived and remained on the planet for two years until he left to find the great warrior Darth Vader.
The battle appears in the flashback portion of the 2013 Dark Horse comic Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 1.
